Package web.cliente

Interface Summary
Interruptible An interface for classes that can be polled to see if they've been interrupted.
 

Class Summary
CloseableFrame A Frame that you can actually quit.
HttpClient The underlying network client used by WebClient.
LabeledTextField A TextField with an associated Label.
NetworkClient A starting point for network clients.
SocketUtil A shorthand way to create BufferedReaders and PrintWriters associated with a Socket.
WebClient A graphical client that lets you interactively connect to Web servers and send custom request lines and request headers.
